naslov: Samobor, Giznik -  kuća s predivnim vrtom, garaža, lokacija (prodaja)
opis: REMAX Centar nekretnina izdvaja iz ponude samostojeću kuću 400 m2 s predivnim vrtom i  pogledom na Samobor. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja, prvog kata i potkrovlja. Odiše mirom i luksuzom kojem ćete teško odoljeti. Na ulazu kuće se proteže ulazni hodnik, blagovaonica, dnevni boravak i kuhinja koje imaju izlaz na prostranu sunčanu terasu. U prizemlju se nalaze dvije radne sobe i toalet te prostorija s jacuzzijem, saunom, sanitarnim čvorom i spravama za vježbanje. Radne sobe se mogu prenamijeniti u spavaće sobe. Na prvom katu se nalaze dvije spavaće sobe s izlazom na terasu, kupaonica, prostrani dnevni boravak, blagovaonica i kuhinja sve s izlazom na terasu. U sklopu hodnika se nalaze dodatna ostava i toalet. Na drugom katu je tavan u roh-bau stanju. Stanovi su odvojeni  unutarnjim stubištem i možete ih iznamjljivati uz manje preinake. Okućnica ima dovoljno prostora za napraviti vanjski bazen za dobivanje dodatnog luksuza ili se može pretvoriti u dodatna parkirna mjesta. Kuća je izgrađena 1994. godine i koristila se kao kuća za odmor.  Na prilazu kuće se nalaze dva garažna mjesta s dodatnim spremištem. Nalazi se u mirnoj ulici s predivnim pogledom na 5 minuta hoda do centra grada, a odvojeno od okoline za potpuni mir i uživanje. Moguća je kupnja kreditom. Preporuka za pogledati! ------------------- REMAX Centar nekretnina presents a detached 400 m² house with a beautiful garden and a stunning view of Samobor. The house consists of a ground floor, first floor, and attic. It radiates peace and luxury that’s hard to resist. Upon entering, you’ll find an entrance hallway, dining room, living room, and kitchen — all with access to a spacious, sunny terrace. The ground floor also includes two office rooms and a toilet, as well as a wellness area with a jacuzzi, sauna, bathroom, and fitness equipment. The office rooms can easily be converted into bedrooms. On the first floor, there are two bedrooms with access to the terrace, a bathroom, a spacious living room, dining area, and kitchen — all opening onto another terrace. The hallway also includes an additional storage room and a toilet. The second floor features an unfinished attic (shell condition). The floors are connected by an internal staircase, allowing the house to be divided into separate units for potential rental use with minimal modifications. The outdoor space offers plenty of room to build a swimming pool for added luxury or to convert into additional parking spaces. Built in 1994, the house has been used as a vacation home. There are two garage parking spaces at the entrance, along with additional storage. Located in a peaceful street with a stunning view, just a 5-minute walk from the town center, yet secluded enough to ensure privacy and tranquility. Mortgage financing is possible. Highly recommended — a must-see!
